mime.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the use of movements to express what you want to say without using words, or a play where the actors use only movements
mime.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The children learn through role-play, dance and mime.
They will perform a short mime later.
mime.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to describe or express something, using movements not words
mime.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Stan put a finger to his mouth, miming ‘shush’.
Soundlessly, she mimed picking up a phone and speaking into it.
mime.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to pretend to play or sing a piece of music, without making any sound
mime.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: Singers on television often mime to pre-recorded tapes.
